price: 24. Esos son mezquinos e incitan a los hombres a la avaricia. Y quien se aleje(de la obediencia a Al-lah) que sepa que Él no necesita nada de nadie y es digno de toda alabanza.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَبۡخَلُونَ وَيَأۡمُرُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ بِٱلۡبُخۡلِۗ وَمَن يَتَوَلَّ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ ٱلۡحَمِيدُ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yabkhalūna wayamurūna al-nāsa bil-bukh'li waman yatawalla fa-inna al-laha huwa al-ghaniyu al-ḥamīdu
